full_threads.body:
Hi WolfIQ team,

https://royalrehablifeworks.com.au/about/

In the About Us section of RR LifeWorks, we have a client story section.

Can the "Read story" text become a link to redirect to the a post:



Can we have a new page post on Joe's client story? Title and text attached in the word doc.


Please add title, text as well as share the video at the bottom. I can add imagery later.


Can there be a section under "About Us" called "Client Stories" where this page/ Joe's story will also sit like a blog post? Similar to News and Publications set up.

Thanks so much,

Janina
